roleset.name: to state wrongly

example.name: pasive
example.text: The date was misstated [*]in Friday 's edition .

example.name: transitive
example.text: Neither technique is perfect , but both are better than the current system , which [*T*] misstates the costs of new credit programs by amounts that [*T*-2]vary substantially and average about $ 20 billion [*U*] annually , according to the Congressional Budget Office .
example.arg: the costs of new credit programs
amounts that [*T*-2]vary substantially and average about $ 20 billion [*U*] annually

roleset.note: MISSTATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'misstate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from misstate.01-v predicate notes)
